channel.title: News on CIRCULODEMAJALIS
channel.description: Recent content in News on CIRCULODEMAJALIS

item.title: "Feira Medieval" submitted to "Turismo de Portugal"
item.description: We would like to thank Dr. Carla Salsinha, president of the regional tourism board of Lisbon, for her sensitivity in understanding our project, the first edition of the Feira Medieval de Canha (Canha Medieval Fair), and for agreeing to submit it to Turismo de Portugal.
